Package elevator

Class DCTowerElevator

java.lang.Object
elevator.DCTowerElevator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Elevator
public class DCTowerElevator extends Object implements Elevator
The DC tower elevator class is an implementation of the Elevator interface.
Author:
Arthur Kaplan

  • Method Details

    • calculateDelay

      public int calculateDelay()
      Calculates a delay time which an elevator needs to reach its destination.
      Arbitrarily set to the number of floors from the current floor to the destination multiplied by 0.5 seconds.
      Specified by:
      calculateDelay in interface Elevator
      Returns:
      the delay in milliseconds

      public void setDestinationFloor() throws ElevatorException
      Description copied from interface: Elevator
      Sets the destination floor. An elevator can only travel between the ground floor and its destination without intermediate stops.
      Specified by:
